mapper.insert: insert into tch_stu_course_open_rel (ID, SCHEDULE_ID, COURSE_OPEN_ID, STU_ID) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scheduleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{courseOpenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into tch_stu_course_open_rel
ID,
SCHEDULE_ID,
COURSE_OPEN_ID,
STU_ID,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{scheduleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{courseOpenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{stuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update tch_stu_course_open_rel
SCHEDULE_ID = #{scheduleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COURSE_OPEN_ID = #{courseOpenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STU_ID = #{stuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select a.STU_ID,c.SCHOOL_YEAR,c.TERM,d.SUBJECT_ID,b.REAL_NAME,b.IDENTITY_CARD,b.STU_NUMBER, b.CLASS_ID,b.GRADE as stuGrade,b.MAJOR_ID,c.COURSE_ID, c.CLASSROOM_ID, d.NAME as courseName ,(select TEXT from sys_dict_item where DICT_TYPE = 'TERM' and CODE = c.TERM) as termText ,(select NAME from tch_class_info where ID = b.CLASS_ID) as className ,(select NAME from sys_classroom where ID = c.CLASSROOM_ID) as classroomText ,(select name from sys_major where id = b.MAJOR_ID) as majorText from tch_stu_course_open_rel a,arc_student_info b,tch_course_open c,tch_course d where a.STU_ID=b.ID and a.COURSE_OPEN_ID=c.ID and c.COURSE_ID=d.ID and a.STU_ID = #{stuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and c.SCHOOL_YEAR = #{schoolYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and c.TERM = #{term,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and d.SUBJECT_ID = #{subjectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by a.STU_ID,c.SCHOOL_YEAR,c.TERM,d.SUBJECT_ID
